Rails Girls Web Dev Series - Pt 1 | Code Equality

Rails Girls Web Dev Series - Pt 1

This a 4-part beginner workshop series that will teach you how to build full-fledged websites and front-end web apps.

May 9, 2015 Time TBA Venue TBA

We’re back!

We’ve been quiet for awhile, but we’re back with a 4-part beginner workshop series that will teach you how to build full-fledged websites and front-end web apps. This is part of our Rails Girls KL effort.

Registration and details here!

Registration runs until April 25th, 2015, so make sure to sign up soon.

Remember to also check out the Rails Girls KL Facebook page and like it for the latest events!
